properties.entry: Unknown command: "{0}"
Error: {0}
Usage: version The 'version' command displays the current application version.
Usage: help [command] The 'help' command displays usage information for the given command.
Usage: exit The 'exit' command closes the application.
Usage: services The 'services' command lists the available services on the server.
Usage: user-by-id [user-id] The 'user-by-id' command fetches information for a single user, given a user id.
Error: A user ID is required.
Usage: user-by-name [username] The 'user-by-name' command fetches information for a single user, given a user name.
Error: A user name is required.
Usage: user-search [query] The 'user-search' command searches users with the given query.
Error: A query is required.
Usage: login [username] [password] [server-uri] The 'login' command logs in to a server.
Error: A username, password, and server URI is required.
Usage: audit-by-time [date-lower] [date-upper]? The 'audit-by-time' command retrieves audit events within a given time range. If the 'date-upper' value is not specified, it defaults to "now".
Error: A lower and upper date range is required.
